name: Call Hating
description:
Call Hating is a DOS-era retro-inspired point-and-click game that answers the question "What could go wrong?"

In Call Hating, you play the role of an aging, forgetful work-from-home worker who hasn't exactly kept up with the latest technology in your home office. When your smartphone breaks and your internet connection goes down, it's up to you to reclaim your bandwidth using obsolete and outdated tech around your house.

With plot and narration inspired by classics such as The Stanley Parable, Call Hating is a work-from-home simulator wrapped in an escape room, stuffed with minigames, and baked in a 500-degree oven of dark and fourth wall-breaking humor. Explore multiple endings that hinge on the choices you make.

Coming June 30, 2023!

Recommended System Specs:

- OS: Windows 95 or earlier
- Processor: Intel Pentium III or earlier
- Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible graphics card with 32MB VRAM or less
- Input: Keyboard & mouse, preferably pre-USB
- Network: 56K dial-up
